name: multiplayer in taiga
description:
Find all parts to make a fireworks box and light it. But watch out, it's cold in the forest and you forgot to bring any food with you.

controls: r to restart, w a s d to move, left mouse button to interact

The game supports multiplayer for up to 4 people. You can share items by dropping them on the ground, but you can drop only the last picked up item from the stack. You'll see each other as randomly coloured rectangles.

When you launch a server, the game will hang up and your friends will have one minute to join or else the program will close.

None of the important items will be covered by other things.

The game should open on any OS if it has JRE (if you can open Minecraft or Runescape, you can open this game).

If you would like to donate Bitcoin, here's my Bitcoin address: 1diUgZyj4YWwEegqCJjFWuQDg3Kf1XV21

Please post links of your gameplay in the comments!
